languages.text: "Вы слышали Вольного Торговца. В {mf|его|ее} словах — мудрость {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Вы слышали Вольного Торговца. В {mf|его|ее} словах — мудрость {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "You heard the Rogue Trader. {mf|His|Her} words carry the wisdom of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

languages.text: “大家都已经听清楚了吧，行商浪人的话蕴含着{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的智慧。”
languages.original_text: "You heard the Rogue Trader. {mf|His|Her} words carry the wisdom of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “大家都已经听清楚了吧，行商浪人的话蕴含着{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的智慧。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Ya habéis oído a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Sus palabras encierran la sabiduría del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}».
languages.original_text: "You heard the Rogue Trader. {mf|His|Her} words carry the wisdom of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «Ya habéis oído a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente. Sus palabras encierran la sabiduría del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「君は自由開拓者の言葉を聞いた。その言葉には{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の叡智が宿っているのだ」
languages.original_text: "You heard the Rogue Trader. {mf|His|Her} words carry the wisdom of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「君は自由開拓者の言葉を聞いた。その言葉には{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の叡智が宿っているのだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} gehört. {mf|Seine|Ihre} Worte übermitteln die Weisheit des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}."
languages.original_text: "You heard the Rogue Trader. {mf|His|Her} words carry the wisdom of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} gehört. {mf|Seine|Ihre} Worte übermitteln die Weisheit des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Tu as entendu {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Ses paroles reflètent la sagesse de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "You heard the Rogue Trader. {mf|His|Her} words carry the wisdom of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Hür Tacir'i işittiniz. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin sözleri, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} bilgeliğini yansıtıyor."
languages.original_text: "You heard the Rogue Trader. {mf|His|Her} words carry the wisdom of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."
